comment: Very laid-back and understanding professor. He always works with students if missing supplies, and if there are misunderstandings about the assignment. He is a genuinely great guy who is very passionate about print, and it is easy to get along with. Made me passionate about printmaking. 100/10 would take his course again!

I took Printmaking 1 with Prof. Stone and he genuinely cares about printmaking. He gave us the freedom to explore topics we were interested in and gave fair and helpful advice. I went into this class scared of printing but left wanting to do more because of how much fun I had.

Really chill guy who really cares about printmaking. The projects we did were really fun and mainly focused in screen printing. This class has a fun and calm environment. I would recommend Greg Stone to anyone trying to take any printmaking class.

Took prof Stone for advanced figure and it was fun. Students got to experiment with mediums he brought in and he was always ready to give feedback on a piece. He also set up an art exhibition for us which was cool. Summer can be a bit heavy though, 4 outside assignments on top of class 4 days a week. Doesn't grade too harshly but does grade fair.
